thread.section_title: Hoselink Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Hoselink | hoselink.com.au
thread.title: liz

author: liz
title: liz
text:
I had an old hose and was trying to wash the car one day. I was struggling with no water getting through due to kinks in the hose. At the tap there was water squirting out. When my nephew arrived he said to me "get a hose link" Aunty Liz I've got one and I brought one for my son for his new house. Best thing I've done. So with that I went on line and I've never looked back. I just love the ease of this hose. People don't struggle with that old hose anymore. That's all I can say.
Liz King
